Tavatron:

Tavatron shut her optics against the rising dust. When the dust finally 
settled she slowly opened them, only to stare into the angry optics of 
BrightBlade.

Before Tavatron knew what had happened she was laying on her back, 
mech-fluid flowing from the wound on her chest. Tavatron instinctively 
covered the wound, trying to slow the flow of mech-fluid, but with little 
success. Tavatron looked up at BrightBlade and growled:

"I am not that easily defeated!" Tavatron flipped to her feet (think that 
thing martial artists do when they fall down) and seperated her staff. She 
unsheathed the energon blades and threw one of the halves at BrightBlade's 
chest.
